name: tee
description: Dépôt de code le la startup d'État "Transition écologique des entreprises"
author: Julien Paris (https://multi.coop)

scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run start-back" "npm run start -w packages/web"
scripts.start-all: npm run build && npx concurrently "npm run start-front" "npm run start-back"
scripts.build-start-dev: npm run build && npx concurrently "npm run start-back" "PORT=4242 npm run start -w packages/web"
scripts.build: npm run build-json-output && npm run build -w packages/backend && npm run build -w packages/web
scripts.build-back: npm run build-json-output && npm run build -w packages/backend
scripts.build-front: npm run build-json-output && npm run build -w packages/web
scripts.build-and-preview-front: npm run build-front && PORT=4242 npm run start-preview -w packages/web
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run build-json-output-watch" "npm run dev -w packages/backend" "npm run dev -w packages/web"
scripts.dev-back: npx concurrently "npm run build-json-output-watch" "npm run dev -w packages/backend"
scripts.dev-front: npx concurrently "npm run build-json-output-watch" "npm run dev -w packages/web"
scripts.lint-concurrently: npx concurrently 'npm run lint -w packages/backend' 'npm run lint -w packages/web' 'npm run lint -w packages/data'
